verbs.description: [ARG1: Global markets] [V: shuddered] [ARGM-TMP: Tuesday] [ARGM-TMP: after President Donald Trump threatened hundreds of billions of dollars worth of tariffs on China , putting the world 's largest economies on the brink of a trade war . The DJIA turned negative for the year and saw its longest losing streak since March 2017] .

Global markets shuddered Tuesday after [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: threatened] [ARG2: hundreds of billions of dollars worth of tariffs] [ARG1: on China] , [ARGM-ADV: putting the world 's largest economies on the brink of a trade war] . The DJIA turned negative for the year and saw its longest losing streak since March 2017 .

The DJIA turned negative for the year and saw its longest losing streak since March 2017 .
